title: Quote a Personal Umbrella Policy
description: A high-net-worth customer wants a quote for a personal umbrella policy for extra liability protection.

tasks.description: Verify the customer has the required underlying liability limits on their auto and home policies.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the customer's underlying policies meet the minimum requirements for an umbrella.

tasks.description: Gather information about any additional risks (e.g., rental properties, watercraft).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent collects all necessary underwriting information.

tasks.description: Generate a quote for a $1 million umbrella policy.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully generates and presents the quote.
